title.narrative: OUTPUT 4 : CHILD PROTECTION ADVOCACY

description.narrative: By 2018, children, families and communities in target counties are able to reject harmful practices and respond to violence against children, family separation and adopt positive social norms, and utilize child protection services, which contributes to Access To Justice, Child Protection â€“ General, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Harmful Practices (Fgm/C And Child Marriage), Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2018, children, families and communities utilize child protection services, underscored by a functional child protection system that prevents and responds to violence, family separation, and harmful practices in regular and emergency situations at national and county levels, including in vulnerable urban areas.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2018, children, families and communities in target counties are able to reject harmful practices and respond to violence againstchildren, family separation and adopt positive social norms, and utilize child protection services

description.narrative: 9,433 girls went through the Alternative Rite of Passage to reduce risk of Female Genital Mutilation/Cutting. 13,500 (8,350 male and 5,150 female) people participated in Community dialogue sessions in support of abandonment of FGM/C. 23 public statements against FGM/C were made by policy makers, politicians and traditional leaders. | Status:Partially Met | As-of Date:30/06/2018

title.narrative: Degree of shift in the social norm upholding FGM/C and child marriage in programme areas
Percentage of districts implementing minimum package of prevention and care of Child Marriage or FGM/C
Number of communities declaring public commitments on the abandonment of FGM/C and child marriage
Number of public statements on the abandonment of FGM/C on record by policy makers, politicians and traditional leaders at national and decentralized
